00036 if (isset($_POST['addrulenumber']) && ($_POST['addrulenumber'] != "")) {
00037     $_SESSION['pfw']->scrub->addRule($_POST['addrulenumber']);
00038     header ("Location: scrubedit.php?rulenumber=". $_POST['addrulenumber']);
00039 }
00040 
00041 if (isset($_GET['up'])) {
00042     $_SESSION['pfw']->scrub->up($_GET['up']);
00043     reload();
00044 }
00045

00047     $_SESSION['pfw']->scrub->down($_GET['down']);
00048     reload();
00049 }
00050 
00051 if (isset($_GET['del'])) {
00052     $_SESSION['pfw']->scrub->del($_GET['del']);
00053     reload();

00056 $active = "scrub";
00057 page_header("Normalization");
00058 ?>
00059 <div id="main">
00060 <h2>Traffic Normalization</h2>
00061 <table>
00062 <tr>
00063     <th>No</th>

00074 <?php
00075 $rulenumber = '0';
00076 foreach ($_SESSION['pfw']->scrub->rules as $rule) {
00077     if ($rule['type'] == 'comment') {
00078         print "<tr>\n\t<td>". $rulenumber. "</td>\n";
00079         print "\t<td class=\"comment\" colspan=\"";
00080         print ('9'). "\">". nl2br(stripslashes($rule['comment'])). "</td>\n";
00081     } else {
00082         if ($rulenumber%2) {
00083             print "<tr class=\"even\">\n";
00084         } else {
00085             print "<tr>\n";
00086         }
00087         print "\t<td>". $rulenumber. "</td>\n";
00088         print "\t<td>". $rule['direction']. "</td>\n";
00089 
00090         print "\t<td>". $rule['interface']. "</td>\n";
00091         if ($rule['all']) {
00092             print "\t<td colspan=\"2\">All</td>\n";
00093         } else {
00094             print "\t<td>". ($rule['from'] ? $rule['from'] : "any"). "</td>\n";
00095             print "\t<td>". ($rule['to'] ? $rule['to'] : "any"). "</td>\n";
00096         }
00097 
00098         print "\t<td>". $rule['min-ttl']. "</td>\n";
00099         print "\t<td>". $rule['max-mss']. "</td>\n";
00100         print "\t<td>". $rule['set-tos']. "</td>\n";
00101 
00102         print "\t<td>";
00103 
00104         if ($rule['no-df']) {
00105             print " no-df";
00106         }
00107         if ($rule['random-id']) {
00108             print " random-id";
00109         }
00110         if ($rule['reassemble']) {
00111             print " reassemble ". $rule['reassemble'];
00112         }
00113 
00114         print "\t</td>\n";
00115 
00116         print "\t<td class=\"rulecomment\">". stripslashes($rule['comment']). "</td>\n";
00117     }
00118     print "\t<td class=\"edit\">";
00119     if ($rule['type'] != 'comment') {
00120         print "\n\t\t<a href=\"scrubedit.php?rulenumber=$rulenumber\">e</a> ";
00121     } else {
00122         print "\n\t\t<a href=\"commentedit.php?action=scrub&amp;rulenumber=$rulenumber\" title=\"Edit Rule\">e</a> ";
00123     }
00124     if ($rulenumber) {
00125         print "\n\t\t<a href=\"". $_SERVER['PHP_SELF']. "?up=$rulenumber\">u</a> ";
00126     } else {
00127         print "\n\t\t u ";
00128     }
00129     if ($rulenumber != (count($_SESSION['pfw']->scrub->rules) - 1)) {
00130         print "\n\t\t<a href=\"". $_SERVER['PHP_SELF']. "?down=$rulenumber\">d</a> ";
00131     } else {
00132         print "\n\t\t d ";
00133     }
00134     print "\n\t\t<a href=\"". $_SERVER['PHP_SELF']. "?del=$rulenumber\" title=\"Delete Rule\" onclick=\"return confirm('Are you sure you want to delete this Rule?')\">x</a> ";
00135     print "\n\t</td>\n";
00136 
00137     print "</tr>\n";
00138     $rulenumber++;
00139 }
00140 ?>
00141 </table>

00143     <form action="<?php print $_SERVER['PHP_SELF'];?>" method="post">
00144         <div id="addrulesform">
00145             <label for="addrulenumber">add new rule as rule number:</label>
00146             <input type="text" name="addrulenumber" id="addrulenumber" size="5" value="<?php print $rulenumber;?>" />
00147             <input type="submit" value="add" />
